welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Arizona City! Known for its breathtaking desert landscapes and rich cultural heritage, this charming city has something for everyone. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Arizona City has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves all international flights and includes customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marana Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Marana Airport is used for shipping and receiving freight and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
